availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas P. Paine (Eddyville, Lyon County, Kentucky, master carpenter and manufacturer)

body.p: Eddyville, Lyon County, Kentucky, master carpenter and manufacturer. North Carolina, native. Married to Mary K. Paine. Father of Thomas R. Paine, Eudora Paine, John E. Paines, Laura Paine, B. P. Paine, and Mary Paine. Master Carpenter in Eddyville in 1860. Manufacturer in Eddyville in 1865. Employed Samuel D. Paine as a carpenter apprentice in Lyon County in 1860.
